<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/tenants/{tenant_id}/segments/{id}/process-file"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Process uploaded CSV file to add members to segment

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"tenant_id","required":true,"in":"path","description":"Tenant ID","schema":{"format":"uuid","type":"string"}},{"name":"id","required":true,"in":"path","description":"Segment ID","schema":{"format":"uuid","type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{},"title":"SegmentCsvFileProcessingDto"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"File processed successfully"},"400":{"description":"Bad request - Invalid file data"},"401":{"description":"Unauthorized"},"404":{"description":"Segment or file not found"},"500":{"description":"Internal Server Error"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
